body:
Comment 4 by **edmccard@hotmail.com**: 
In light of the fact that issue #3009 was fixed to "allow top-level package outside
$GOPATH", I thought that I could expect everything to still work. But spending an hour
trying to figure out why the changes I made while debugging a GOPATH-resident package
were not having any effect when doing "go run" was certainly discouraging.

Personally I'd prefer to be forbidden from working outside the GOPATH by having the "go"
tool give an error, rather than "discouraged" by having the behavior silently change.
